seo.title: Body Canvas - Premium Tattoo Studio | Custom Ink Art
seo.description: Transform your vision into stunning tattoo art at Body Canvas. Expert custom designs, professional artistry, and exceptional aftercare. Book your consultation today.

openGraph.title: Body Canvas - Premium Custom Tattoo Studio

sessions.subtitle: Professional tattooing services tailored to your vision and comfort
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee with complimentary touch-ups within 6 months

testimonials.quote: Alex transformed my rough idea into an incredible piece of art. The attention to detail and professionalism at Body Canvas is unmatched.
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell

testimonials.quote: Three tattoos later and I keep coming back. The custom designs are always unique and the studio atmosphere is so welcoming and professional.
testimonials.author: James Thompson

paragraphs: With over 8 years of professional tattooing experience, Alex Rivera founded Body Canvas with a vision to create truly personalized tattoo art. Specializing in custom designs that blend traditional techniques with contemporary artistry, every piece is crafted to tell your unique story.

From intricate geometric patterns to flowing organic designs, Alex's versatile style adapts to bring your vision to life. The studio maintains the highest standards of cleanliness and professionalism, ensuring every client feels comfortable and confident throughout their tattoo journey.
about.callout: Every tattoo is a collaboration between artist and client, resulting in truly one-of-a-kind artwork.
about.imageAlt: Alex Rivera, professional tattoo artist and founder of Body Canvas studio

items.question: How do I prepare for my tattoo session?
items.answer: Get a good night's sleep, eat a proper meal beforehand, stay hydrated, and avoid alcohol or blood-thinning medications. Bring ID and wear comfortable clothing that allows easy access to the tattoo area.

items.question: What's included in the aftercare process?
items.answer: You'll receive detailed aftercare instructions, premium healing products, and ongoing support. We also include complimentary touch-ups within 6 months if needed, ensuring your tattoo heals perfectly.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Your Masterpiece?
finalCta.subheadline: Join hundreds of satisfied clients who chose Body Canvas for their tattoo journey

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo vision and we'll schedule your consultation. A £50 deposit secures your appointment.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss your design ideas.
booking.depositDisclaimer: £50 deposit required to secure appointment, deducted from final session cost

contact.address: 123 Ink Street, Creative Quarter, Manchester M1 1AA
